text:
Wish could give half points as would have been a 4 1/2,  the food was good but be warned the portions are large we ended up having to take out our deserts as were to full.

The food itself was good and enjoyable although spent a while trying to work out how to do the online ordering!

was walking past the next day and went for a coffee, was good again.

While the dishes may seem simple, one can trust that Real Food painstakingly prepares each ingredient with the intention of health and well-being. They have a variety of vegetarian food - Chinese, Western, and so on. If not for the costs, I will definitely frequent this place. But if it's within your budget, consider coming here more regularly to support their business!
Chance upon this place cos not many vegetarian option at orchard area.We ordered Fried dumpling 8.5/9.  noodles  8/10 if the noodles are thinner will rate 10/10 and baked rice 9/10. Overall is good.

The food is still as nice as when I first tried them in central mall (Clarke quay) !! I tried the vegetable capanato pasta, apple crumble pie and the spring roll. All are very good and delicious! The service is also exemplary! 👏👏👏🤩

Came specially for their peanut butter tart again and we gotten the last slice, so pleased. Also tried for the first time, their Passion fruit cheese tart, yummy! Kai Xin was very helpful to accede my request for a customized Rojak for our elderly father who’s craving for Rojak but unable to chew properly. She made our dining experience exceptional. Thank you Kai Xin. 🥰🙏🏻
